text: Elena Matous (born 10 May 1953) is a retired Italian alpine skier, who competed for Italy, San Marino, Iran and Luxembourg. She had one second place in the downhill event at the 1977 Alpine Skiing World Cup and finished eighth overall. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female alpine skiers Category:Universiade medalists in alpine skiing Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Italy Category:Competitors at the 1981 Winter Universiade
title: Elena Matous
